thread.section_title: Marley Spoon Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Marley Spoon | marleyspoon.com | 2 of 18
thread.title: Dianne

author: Dianne
title: Dianne
text: I have tried three other home meal kit companies and Martha & Marley Spoon is by far the best. The majority of meals are basically familiar, but with a unique twist. The ingredients are easy to find, therefore the meals are repeatable. This makes them become part of your own repertoire. Although I find myself learning new skills, nothing is very difficult. All the ingredients are wrapped securely, which I found was not true of some other companies. The ingredients are not only fresh, but top quality. I'm sticking with Martha!
